resource_explanation: Areas are groupings of climbing sites, they allow the creation of logical groups such as the "Forest of Fontainebleau", or the Calanques
explanation:
Search route in area `id` filtered by grade. You can put two grades separated by a space to go up all the routes between these two grades _(see example below)_.

Example for grade params:
  • 6a : return all the 6a of the area
  • 6a 6a+ : return all the 6a and 6a+ of the area
  • 7 : return all the routes in the 7th degree (from 7a to 7c+)
  • 5c 6b : return all routes between 5c and 6b
